name: Options_hasShortOptionTest
description: Unit tests for the hasShortOption method in the Options class.

test_cases.name: testHasShortOption_ExistingOption
test_cases.description: Tests the hasShortOption method for an existing short option.

test_cases.name: testHasShortOption_NonExistingOption
test_cases.description: Tests the hasShortOption method for a non-existing short option.

test_cases.name: testHasShortOption_WithLeadingHyphens
test_cases.description: Tests the hasShortOption method with leading hyphens in the option name.
